item.title: He's the budget scorekeeper for Congress. Lately, it's been a tough job
item.description: The Congressional Budget Office has faced criticism over its analysis of Republicans' big tax breaks and spending cuts bill

item.title: How to navigate social media trends without derailing your budget
item.description: From coastal grandma to clean girl aesthetic, microtrends are everywhere on social media, and you're often encouraged to spend money to participate

item.title: EU official: Automakers to save 500-600 million euros as trade deal with US takes effect
item.description: European automakers are set to save around 500-600 million euros each month after the Trump administration implemented the U.S. end of its trade deal ...

item.description: World shares are mostly lower, with Asian and European indexes down after overnight losses on Wall Street

item.title: A US lawmaker in China says there's 'a lot of work to do' to resolve trade conflict
item.description: A U.S. congressional delegation visiting China says much needs to be done to resolve the U.S.-China trade conflict
